Docs.summary: Provides support for rendering a partial view.

Docs.param: The name of the partial view
Docs.summary: Renders the specified partial view by using the specified HTML helper.

Docs.param: The name of the partial view.
Docs.summary: Renders the specified partial view, passing it a copy of the current object, but with the Model property set to the specified model.

Docs.param: The name of the partial view.
Docs.summary: Renders the specified partial view, replacing its ViewData property with the specified object.

Docs.param: The name of the partial view.
The model for the partial view.
The view data for the partial view.
Docs.summary: Renders the specified partial view, replacing the partial view's ViewData property with the specified object and setting the Model property of the view data to the specified model.
